name: Blub
description:
Guide Blub through levels containing strange enemies. Help him find his way to meet his friends. find keys to advance,

and enter doors.

Watch out for rats wearing hard hats

and spiders, they can catch you pretty quickly

There are phone and post boxes that will chase you when you get too close

use the platforms and jump on tyres to find your way through

Watch out for flying fish

Its a fun game, you decide the pace you like to play at.
